title: 70's font and script font
content:
These are both pretty well used, I just haven’t found out what they’re called. Help me out on this one, please!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [dikstudio.net2\_.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20090703055733/http:/typophile.com/files/dikstudio.net2_.png) | 168.99 KB |
| [Bild 4.PNG](http://web.archive.org/web/20090703055733/http:/typophile.com/files/Bild%204.PNG) | 329.79 KB |
author: yusf

comments.content: First one (70’s) is ITC Serif Gothic.
The scripts are from the [Sign Painter Font Kit from House](http://web.archive.org/web/20090703055733/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/signpainterfontkit).
Thanks a bunch, Jan! Made my day!
